mapper.insert: insert into `order` ( id, orderNo, `type`, amount, discounted_amount, supplier_id, supplier_mobile, supplier_name, pedlarId, pedlar_mobile, status, reserve_startTime, reserve_endTime, create_time, assign_time, response_time, arrive_time, confirm_time, finish_time, evaluation_score, supplier_point, pedlar_point, addr_detail, area_pro, area_city, area_county, area_town, remark, delivery_id ) values ( #{id}, #{orderNo}, #{type}, #{amount}, #{discounted_amount}, #{supplier_id}, #{supplier_mobile}, #{supplier_name}, #{pedlarId}, #{pedlar_mobile}, #{status}, #{reserve_startTime}, #{reserve_endTime}, #{create_time}, #{assign_time}, #{response_time}, #{arrive_time}, #{confirm_time}, #{finish_time}, #{evaluation_score}, #{supplier_point}, #{pedlar_point}, #{addr_detail}, #{area_pro}, #{area_city}, #{area_county}, #{area_town}, #{remark}, #{delivery_id} )
